Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurring immediately after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER that eventually lead to a successful Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER events that are followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE within the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER relative to the total number of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Frequency of the variant pattern: Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER → Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER cases that re-enter the approval loop more than once before final approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER events associated with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER compared to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, given the goal to reduce rejections by pre-approver (to assess cross-role rejection patterns)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that include Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER earlier in the same case
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of all cases involving Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER that result in Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER in a subsequent iteration
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER across all process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER that occur in cases where the supervisor and budget owner are different roles (inferred from process description)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER in cases that ultimately succeed (i.e., reach Payment Handled) versus those that terminate in rejection
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER out of all rejection activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE, and Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
